sentences.english: You start at the bottom and you work your way to the top.
sentences.chinese: 你要從底層做起，一步一個腳印走向成功的頂峯。

sentences.english: One step at a time, business integrity is a business growth of the Big Dipper .
sentences.chinese: 一步一個腳印，商業誠信是企業成長的北斗星。
